description:
I Lost my Job Now What?

We can feel a range of emotions when it comes to job loss. According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics (2014), thousands of Americans are still unemployed. The symptoms of depression, anxiety, self-loathing and anger can alter the esteem of an individual. This does not have to be your case! You can immediately change your position and perspective in life by learning some of the principles necessary for a career makeover. The course will discuss the following

How to Build Motivation After Job Loss

Changing Perspective of Job Loss

Unlock Your Potential

This is an interactive course that uses journal assignments, career analysis, and introspection. Anyone who is in the midst of a career transition can benefit from this course.
title: I Lost My Job, Now What? Principles of a Career Makeover
